patient_info: Renal potassium wasting,Skin rash,Prolonged QT interval,Dyspnea,Hypokalemia,Hyperchloriduria,Hypomagnesemia,Increased urinary potassium,Generalized muscle weakness,Paresthesia,Renal magnesium wasting,Hyponatriuria,Hypernatriuria,Hypermagnesiuria,Metabolic alkalosis
golden_diagnosis: Gitelman 综合征/Gitelman syndrome; GS/Gitelman syndrome/Gitelman syndrome,Gitelman 综合征/Gitelman syndrome; GS/Gitelman syndrome/Gitelman syndrome,Gitelman 综合征/Gitelman syndrome; GS/Gitelman syndrome/Gitelman syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Primary hyperparathyroidism
2. Hyperparathyroidism secondary to chronic kidney disease
3. Hyperkalemia due to a potassium-sensing receptor autoimmune disorder (e.g., primary hyperparathyroidism,公开展示)
4. Hypokalemia due to a potassium-sensing receptor autoimmune disorder
5. Hypomagnesemia due to a potassium-sensing receptor autoimmune disorder
6. Hypernatriuria and hypermagnesiuria due to a kidney disorder or mineral代谢紊乱
7. Renal potassium wasting due to a kidney disorder or mineral metabolism disorder
8. Paresthesia and muscle weakness due to a neural disorder or electrolyte imbalance
9. Dyspnea and renal magnesium wasting due to a cardiomyopathy or neuromuscular disorder
10. Long QT interval and metabolic alkalosis due to an electrolyte imbalance or a renal disorder.
